title: Five-Star Chikmagalur Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Tea & Coffee Plantation Tour
description:
Indulge in the exquisite allure of Java Rain Resorts Chikmagalur, a Balinese-inspired sanctuary nestled in the misty foothills of Mullayanagiri Peak. This multi-award-winning retreat, enveloped by silver oaks, wild figs, and orange trees, offers an intimate view of sprawling coffee and spice plantations. Easily accessible from Mangaluru and Bengaluru, this coffee paradise makes for the perfect weekend escape. Unwind in one of the 28 unique, coffee-inspired villas, each boasting luxurious features such as outdoor showers, private jacuzzis, or pools. Savour regional and global delicacies at the resort's restaurants, or immerse yourself in the tranquility of the infinity pool, quaint coffee shop, or library. 

For the adventurous, explore nearby hiking routes, trekking trails, or the enchanting Bhadra Wildlife Sanctuary and Hebbe Waterfalls. A paradise for coffee aficionados, this resort is a captivating blend of luxury and nature, promising an unforgettable escape.

title: Mountainside Villa Escape with All-Inclusive Meals
description: Escape on a relaxing mini-break to the Java Rain Resort, staying in a luxury villa in the midst of a beautiful working coffee plantation. Relax and indulge in the midst of spectacular emerald-green scenery, sun-kissed hills and sparkling streams in the Mullayangiri hills in Chikmagalur, situated between Bangalore and Mangalore. Includes all-inclusive breakfast, lunch and dinner, one 30-minute massage per person and a 15% discount on cocktails.
